## Everything you need to start a website

We take the best parts of state-of-the-art tools and add our own innovations.

::: {layout-ncol=3}

{{< li evyuuwna trigger=loop delay=1000 class=small >}} **Bring Your Own Framework**  Build your site using React, Svelte, Vue, Preact, web components, or just plain ol' HTML + JavaScript.

{{< li lzgmgrnn trigger=loop delay=1000 class=small >}} **100% Static HTML, No JS** CloudCore Solutions renders your entire page to static HTML, removing all JavaScript from your final build by default.

{{< li yxyampao trigger=loop delay=1000 class=small >}} **On-Demand Components** Need some JS? We can automatically hydrate interactive components when they become visible on the page.

{{< li bxdnmmpl trigger=loop delay=1000 class=small >}} **Broad Integration** We support TypeScript, Scoped CSS, CSS Modules, Sass, Tailwind, Markdown, MDX, and any other npm packages.
